usg: Use to specify the relationship of the linked resource. It is more for information which search engines or other programs can utilize.

vals.desc: An alternative link in terms of another medium / language / format
Provides details / contact of the auther of the document
A resource provides further details / help
A resource describing the licensing information
A resource that is continuation of current one
To specify not to follow the linked resource because it is not endorsed by the author
To specify not to set Window.opener property for the url opened frame
To specify not to send an HTTP referer header if the user navigates to the hyperlink
To specify previous resource in the series
To specify linked resource is specially designed for searching current one
A resource describing a tag that applies to this document.
